task.title: Embed an App on your Site using Livefyre.js
task.shortdesc: Add Livefyre Apps to your web pages using the Livefyre.js embed code structure.

taskbody.context:
This documentation is intended for a technical audience.
This section describes the code structure that you’ll need to include in your page template to embed Livefyre Apps on your site.Comments Example

step.cmd: Create an .html file with a Livefyre placeholder.

info.p: Create a new .html file in the text editor of your choice. Create a placeholder Livefyre <div>element in which the App will be embedded.

Then, include the Livefyre JS Library. Place the following reference in a <script> element in your <head> element. Then, open your page in a browser and use your browser’s web inspector to confirm that Livefyre is loaded.
